code:
import Test from'@/components/test';import Login from'@/views/Login';import Main from'@/views/Main';/**
 * 路由表
 * @param {*} path:地址
 * @param {*} name:名称
 * @param {*} component:组件
 * @param {*} isAuth:是否需要登录权限
 */var routerMap=[{path:'/',name:'测试',component:Test,isAuth:true},{path:'/login',name:'登录',component:Login,isAuth:false},{path:'/main',name:'首页',component:Main,isAuth:true}];export var pathMatch=function pathMatch(path){var pathArr=path.split('/');var regexp=/^\{\w+\}$/i;var matchRes=routerMap.find(function(res){var itemArr=res.path.split('/');itemArr.forEach(function(str,index){if(regexp.test(str)){itemArr[index]=pathArr[index];}});if(JSON.stringify(itemArr)===JSON.stringify(pathArr)){return res;}});if(matchRes){return matchRes;}return null;};export default routerMap;
